name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check posts by tag in DEV

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can review the top 10 weekly or monthly posts by tag in DEV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is a chrome extension for DEV, a community of software developers(https://dev.to/). Select a #tag of interest and it will display 10 posts from the past week or the past month with the corresponding #tag in order of popularity. 

You can select multiple #tags (or just one #tag) and check the list of posts, just like checking SNS timeline for information. You can read the post you are interested in by clicking on the link.

Naturally, the best way to gather information is to visit DEV community directly.This extension is a simple tool to make DEV community more accessible and to create an opportunity to gather information more easily.

◆ How to use
1, Specify the period of time (7days or 30days) for which you want to collect articles.

2, Then select the #tag you are interested in (e.g. language or topic).

3, 10 articles will be displayed in order of popularity for the specified period.

4, When you select an article of interest, a new tab will take you to the linked page.

◆ More Information
・It is also possible to select multiple #tags and have 10 items displayed for each #tag. (items will be displayed consecutively).
・You can also search for #tag, although not all #tags that exist in DEV. Just type them into the form！
・Select the Clear button to clear the history.
